-	shop	shop_craftingmisc	-1,7142:80000,7155:280,7003:968,957:82,511:10,510:60,509:120,7565:350,7033:114,950:265,7134:250,1034:342,7030:208,7097:924,7938:1500,7221:740,1035:484,1096:780,7123:1025,7002:658,1048:800,518:500,7069:1042,7099:773,7210:790,969:150000,989:600000,998:100,999:1000,1000:4500,613:1000,614:3000,615:5000,612:150,990:10000,991:10000,992:10000,993:10000,1002:5000,1003:15000,999:30000,723:100000,728:100000,727:100000,1010:-1,1011:-1,7134:100,911:-1,1092:-1,1093:-1
-	cashshop	shop_refiningmats	-1,12920:200,14176:200,13610:100,14219:100,17246:600,12921:200,13611:100,14177:200,17247:600,6635:50,23436:1500,16259:150,16261:300,16258:150,16260:300,23914:500,16259:250,16261:500
-	cashshop	shop_buffpot_misc	-1,14351:50,100007:100,100008:100,25793:100,12684:25,22820:100,22821:100,22819:200,100006:200,17229:500,16268:1000,16267:1000,100316:25,100317:25,22817:25,100005:25,22816:25,22818:25,12428:2
-	shop	shop_alchemy	-1,7139:1000,7135:3000,7136:3000,7138:3000,7137:5000,12717:1000,12718:1000,12719:1000,12720:1000,12721:1000,12722:1000,12723:1000,12724:1000,100521:1000,720:1000,6211:1000,6210:1000,6212:1000,1033:200,905:40
-	shop	shop_pet_food	-1,25231:1000,1000227:1000,11616:1000,1000552:1000,1000889:1000,25233:1000,25377:1000,6109:1000,6107:1000,6100:1000,7822:1000,7824:1000,7821:1000,7823:1000,7766:1000,6105:1000,25232:1000,6106:1000

-	script	custom_shop	FAKE_NPC,{
	switch( select( "- Buy Consumables",
	               	"- Buy Ammunitions",
	               	"- Buy Crafting and Misc Items",
	               	"- Sell Items",
					"- Buy Refining Materials",
					"- Buy Pots and Utilities",
					"- ^0000FFBuy Other Materials^000000",
										"- Buy Pet Foods"))
	{
		case 1: callshop "shop_consumable",1; break;
		case 2: callshop "shop_ammo",1;       break;
		case 3: callshop "shop_craftingmisc",1;       break;
		case 4: callshop "shop_consumable",2; break;
		case 5: callshop "shop_refiningmats",1;       break;
		case 6: callshop "shop_buffpot_misc",1;       break;
		case 7: callshop "shop_alchemy",1;       break;
		case 8: callshop "shop_pet_food",1;       break;
		default:                              break;
	}
}

prontera,150,180,5	duplicate(custom_shop)	Tool Dealer#go0	24000
morocc,163,97,5	duplicate(custom_shop)	Tool Dealer#go1	24000
geffen,112,63,5	duplicate(custom_shop)	Tool Dealer#go2	24000
payon,176,108,5	duplicate(custom_shop)	Tool Dealer#go3	24000
alberta,38,241,5	duplicate(custom_shop)	Tool Dealer#go4	24000
izlude,121,150,5	duplicate(custom_shop)	Tool Dealer#go5	24000
